summary: This is an email correspondence from July 23, 2019, reporting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein told staff on suicide watch that his cellmate had tried to kill him, based on a suicide watch log entry from earlier that morning.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who reported to staff that his cellmate tried to kill him while he was on suicide watch.

events.title: Epstein reports cellmate attack attempt
events.description: According to a suicide watch log, inmate Jeffrey Epstein told staff that his cellmate tried to kill him.

keyFacts: On July 23, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch in custody.
Epstein reported to staff that his cellmate had attempted to kill him.
The report is based on a suicide watch log entry from approximately 2:15 AM on that date.
